author: Simon Difford
description: Described as being an "applejack sour with orgeat," we've adapted the recipe to use commercially available orgeat. If using a more artisan orgeat then you may want to use as much as 30ml/1oz orgeat and forgo the sugar and water.There is no orange in the cocktail but it's surprising how much the orange zest twist influences this drink and adds complexity.
